Main.PhoneConfirmText1: A message with a 6-digit confirmation code has been sent to
Main.titleHome: Marketplace of wholesale goods from Turkey — TuranLine: the best prices
Main.descriptionHome: Welcome to TuranLine — your ideal marketplace for wholesale goods from Turkey! We offer a wide range of products from trusted suppliers, providing reliable delivery and favorable terms of cooperation. Grow your business with us!
Main.titleCatalog: Catalog of wholesale goods from Turkey — TuranLine: a wide selection
Main.descriptionCatalog: Discover the catalog of wholesale products on the TuranLine platform. We offer products of various categories: textiles, electronics, furniture and more from reliable Turkish manufacturers at competitive prices.
Main.titleModeration: Product Moderation — TuranLine: Quality and compliance check
Main.descriptionModeration: This page is intended for checking and approving products before placing them on the TuranLine marketplace. We carefully control the quality and reliability of each product, ensuring compliance with high standards.
Main.titleGood: Products and prices — TuranLine: great business deals
Main.descriptionGood: Check out our product range and find out the current prices for wholesale purchases. We offer a wide range of quality goods from Turkey at competitive prices for your business. Place an order with convenience and benefit for you.
Main.titlePolicy: Privacy Policy — TuranLine: Protecting your data
Main.descriptionPolicy: The security of your data is our priority! The privacy policy describes in detail the measures we take to protect your information. We guarantee the confidentiality of your personal data and compliance with all legal regulations.
Main.titleOrders: Orders — TuranLine: Order management and status tracking
Main.descriptionOrders: Track your orders easily and conveniently! Here you can view the status of your purchases, track delivery and manage your orders. A simple and intuitive tracking system will allow you to always keep up to date.
Main.titleAbout: About us — TuranLine: information about the company and our services
Main.descriptionAbout: Get to know the TuranLine company. We specialize in the wholesale supply of goods from Turkey, offering our customers a wide range and high quality products. We strive for long-term partnership and satisfaction of your needs.
Main.titleDelivery: Delivery — TuranLine: fast and reliable ways to deliver goods
Main.descriptionDelivery: Find out about our delivery terms on the TuranLine platform. We provide fast, reliable and safe delivery of goods to your address to meet all the needs of your business and ensure timely receipt of orders.
Main.titleContacts: Contacts — TuranLine: Contact us for support
Main.descriptionContacts: Contact us for any questions about our wholesale products from Turkey! We are always ready to help with product selection, ordering and delivery arrangements. Our specialists will answer all your questions and provide all the necessary information. Call, write or leave a request on the website.
Main.titleFavorites: Favorites — TuranLine: Save the best products for quick order
Main.descriptionFavorites: Here are your favorite wholesale products from Turkey! Save your favorite items to Favorites to quickly find them later and place an order. Convenient access to the list of selected products, the ability to compare prices and characteristics. Don't waste your time – place an order right now!
Main.titleCart: Shopping Cart — TuranLine: Check your order before checkout
Main.descriptionCart: View the contents of your shopping cart on TuranLine. Make sure that all the necessary items are added, check their quantity and cost. Then you can easily and quickly proceed to checkout with maximum convenience.
Main.titlePayment: Payment — TuranLine: convenient and secure ways to pay for orders
Main.descriptionPayment: Find out all about the payment methods on the TuranLine platform. We offer reliable, convenient and safe methods to complete your purchases. Ensure a comfortable payment process with minimal effort and maximum convenience.
Main.titleRegistration1: Stage 1 of registration — TuranLine: create an account for purchases
Main.descriptionRegistration1: Fill out a simple registration form on the TuranLine platform and create your account. Enter your first name, last name, phone number, email, username and strong password to access all the features of the platform.
